com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class BaseLegend

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseLegend
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Legend
public class BaseLegend
extends Object
implements Legend

The BaseLegend implements the Legend interface model.It will draw a Legend on the given graphics contents for the showing layers on the map.

See Also:
Legend

getLegendSize

public Dimension getLegendSize()
Obtains the default legend size. The size is calculated based on the patch size, font and number of items, it is the minimum size to hold the legend. When the legend is resized, it will be not changed

Specified by:
getLegendSize in interface Legend
Returns:
an java.awt.Dimension object.
